name: The Valar come to Arda
description: The Valar come to Arda and begin to prepare the world for the Children of Ilúvatar. With them Melkor descends to Earth and destroys their works.

name: Tulkas ends the First War
description: Tulkas descends to Arda, drives out Melkor and ends the First War

name: Creation of the Lamps
description: Aulë forges Illuin and Ormal, the Light-pillars of the Valar. The Valar order Middle-earth and move to Almaren. Beginning of the Spring of Arda.

name: Melkor returns and builds Utumno
description: Melkor returns to Arda and begins building Utumno.

name: Destruction of the Lamps
description: Destruction of the two Lamps Illuin and Ormal by Melkor. The Valar move to Aman and abandon Middle-earth, which then falls to Melkor. End of the Spring of Arda.

name: Creation of the Two Trees
description: Yavanna, Lady of Plants, creates together with Nienna, Lady of Grief, the Two Trees on the hill Ezellohar in Aman.
